title: The Masked Singer Australia: The Lion is unmasked as Kate Ceberano
text:
The Masked Singer's Lion was revealed on Monday night, and it truly was not a surprise to many of those watching at home.

Most fans appeared to have guessed that Lion was indeed singer Kate Ceberano weeks ago, with some so sure that they called the reveal 'underwhelming'.

When the 52-year-old lifted off her mane, many viewers also expressed their surprise that the judges were unable to identify her.

Hear her roar: The Masked Singer's Lion was revealed on Sunday night

One person tweeted: 'The only people in the country not to guess Kate Ceberano [were] the bloody judges!'

Another chimed in: 'Called it! Kate’s voice is so amazing and distinctive, how could you not pick it?!'

Someone else watching at home added: 'This reveal was so underwhelming, seems so contrived especially given they couldn't pick her voice when everyone on the street could.'

Guessed right? It truly was not a surprise to many of those watching at home

Knew it! Most fans appeared to have guessed that Lion was indeed singer Kate Ceberano weeks ago, with some so sure that they called the reveal 'underwhelming'

Feeling free! Once she was unmasked, Kate said that the experience was transformative for her. She said: 'Being in a suit you are without colour, age, size, your gender - it's completely based on what you are, you're just free'

One fan raved: 'Please, it was obviously the queen Kate Ceberano. How did they not guess?'

Yet another tweeted: 'I think everyone guessed Kate Ceberano straight away. I did as soon as I heard the lion start singing.'

Once she was unmasked, Kate said that the experience was transformative for her.

One person tweeted, 'The only people in the country not to guess Kate Ceberano [were] the bloody judges!'

She said: 'Being in a suit you are without colour, age, size, your gender - it's completely based on what you are, you're just free.'

The singer also wanted to inspire her teenage daughter.

Kate added: 'I have a near 16-year-old daughter. I want her to know that you can never ever be fooled by even your own insecurities, you must always give it a good, hard crack.'
description: The Masked Singer's Lion was revealed on Monday night, and it truly was not a surprise to many of those watching at home.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
